post.text:

comment.author: Evan
comment.text: Don't like Donald at all rude and out of control. So if he wins is it still rigged????? Sad people really think that will happen. I love my lord and savior he has the final say.

replies.author: Caitlin
replies.text: Trump is not rude, he tells it like it is. You need to leave if you do like Trump because you are out numbered here, Dennis
